name: Non-Linear Text Quests
description: Non-Linear Text Quests is a bundle of text games of various genres. Here you can find interactive stories with branching plots and text-only versions of classic Point & Click quests, where you can communicate with different characters, use your inventory and combine items in various locations.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 2000 Processor: CPU 1 Ghz or higher Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated graphics Storage: 400 MB available space Sound Card: Any sound card
